text: Baluna, tomara bhebe dekhecha ki, yadi eta allahara paksa theke haya ebam tomara eke aman'ya kara ebam bani isara'ilera ekajana saksi era pakse saksya diye ete bisbasa sthapana kare; ara tomara ahankara kara, tabe tomadera ceye abibecaka ara ke habe? Niscaya allaha abibecakaderake patha dekhana na.
